sorcery.name: Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Elementary sorcery. Fire a soul arrow. Soul arrows inflict magic damage, making them effective against iron armor, tough scales, and other physically resilient materials
sorcery.acquired: Starting spell for the Sorcery Class

sorcery.name: Great Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Sorcery which improves upon Soul Arrow. Fires a more powerful soul arrow. Many sorceries inflict magic damage, making them effective against iron armor, tough scales, and other physically resilient materials.

sorcery.name: Heavy Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Elementary, yet practical sorcery from long ago. Fires a heavy soul arrow. Offers greater power but slower casting time, entailing a vulnerability that makes this sorcery trickier to handle.
sorcery.acquired: Starting spell for the Sorcery Class

sorcery.name: Great Heavy Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Sorcery which improves upon Heavy Soul Arrow. Fires a more powerful heavy soul arrow. Sorceries are a logical discipline: their strength influenced by the caster's intelligence.

sorcery.name: Farron Dart
sorcery.description: Variation of Soul Arrow developed by sorcerers of the Undead Legion of Farron. Fire a soul dart. Well known among the Farron sorceries, it is learned far and wide due to its ease of use.
